thread.title: Save 35% on Prosecco

author: The Telegraph
title: Save 35% on Prosecco
text: Telegraph readers can enjoy the perfect splash of summer elegance, with 12 bottles of Corte delle Calli Prosecco Frizante for only £71.88 (rrp £113.88), saving £42. Corte delle Calli is made in a century-old estate in the hills north of Venice. Made in a frizzante style, with light flavours of apples, pears and a hint of lemon, it has a delicate sparkle sure to dazzle at any celebration. HOW TO CLAIM See the newspaper this Saturday, July 4, 2015 for details on how you can claim this fantastic offer. *£7.99 postage and packaging payable. Follow @telegraph
